entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Westport
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:22 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 4.0°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High plus 5.

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Ice pellets. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Ice pellets or rain beginning near noon then changing to rain late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
